item.title: Create your own maintenance pod
item.description: Intro So the other day i tried to update my k3s cluster running at the Oracle Cloud. Somehow, my Postgres statefulset crashed and the postmaster.pid file was not removed properly. Anyway, the pod was restarted but was now in a CrashLoopBackOff stage. The error message stated that the lock file couldnÂ´t be removed. So how do you remove a file from a PersistentVolumeClaim with the container constantly restarting? I found something.
